The coach with the longest tenure at the University of Oklahoma is Bob Stoops, who served from 1999 to 2016, totaling 18 years. This makes his tenure the longest among all head coaches in the program's history.

**Answer:**  
Bob Stoops has the longest tenure as head coach at the University of Oklahoma with 18 years (from 1999 to 2016).
